terms-and-conditions:
These Terms & Conditions ("Agreement") govern your use of the Photoshoot AI online service ("Service"), provided by Photoshoot AI ("Company," "we," or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by this Agreement.

1. User Registration

1.1 By signing up for the Service, you represent that you are at least 18 years old or have the necessary legal consent to use the Service. You may sign up using your email and password or through third-party social logins (e.g., Google, Facebook, Microsoft).

1.2 During the registration process, you may be required to provide personal information, including but not limited to your gender, ethnicity, and age. This information is optional and used solely to enhance the accuracy of the custom model generation.

2. Image Uploads

2.1 You may upload up to 30 pictures of your face in JPG, PNG or GIF format. By uploading these images, you confirm that you have the necessary rights and permissions to use and share the uploaded content.

2.2 You understand and acknowledge that the quality and accuracy of the generated images are dependent on the quality and variety of the pictures you upload.

3. Custom Model Generation

3.1 Upon uploading your images, our Service will generate a custom model based on your provided pictures. The model generation process typically takes between 15 to 20 minutes.

4. Image Generation

4.1 Once the custom model is generated, you will have access to various options, including selecting locations, backgrounds, outfits, and more, to generate professional images.

4.2 The base plan you purchase provides you with 10 credits, which can be used to generate images. Additionally, you have the option to purchase a top up for 100 additional credits. The top up can be purchased multiple times.

4.3 We do not guarantee the quality or absence of AI artifacts in the generated images. You acknowledge that the images are provided "as is" and use them at your own risk.

5. Ownership of Generated Images

5.1 You retain full ownership of the generated images produced through our Service.

6. Privacy and Data Protection

6.1 We respect your privacy and handle your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. The images you upload are solely used for training the custom model and are deleted from our servers after the training process is completed.

7. User Responsibilities

7.1 You agree to use the Service in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

7.2 You shall not upload pictures of minors or any explicit or inappropriate content.

8. Intellectual Property

8.1 The custom model, software, algorithms, and all associated intellectual property rights related to the Service are owned by the Company.

9. Limitation of Liability

9.1 The Company shall not be held liable for any inaccuracies, imperfections, or AI artifacts in the generated images. The quality and resemblance of the images to the user are dependent on the uploaded pictures.

10. Termination of Service

10.1 The Company reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to the Service at any time, without prior notice, for any reason, including but not limited to violation of this Agreement.

10.2 The Company may remove any generated images and user data in the event of termination or suspension of the Service.

11. Refunds

11.1 All purchases made for credits or addons are non-refundable. Once you have purchased credits or addons, no refunds will be provided for any reason, including but not limited to user dissatisfaction, changes in preferences, or account termination.

11.2 You acknowledge and agree that the purchase of credits or addons is final and that you will not seek a refund from the Company.

11.3 In the event of termination of your access to the Service due to a violation of this Agreement or any other reason, you will not be entitled to a refund for any remaining credits.

11.4 The Company reserves the right to make exceptions to this refund policy in its sole discretion, such as in cases of technical issues or errors caused by the Service. Any such exceptions will be determined on a case-by-case basis.
privacy-policy:
This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how Photoshoot AI ("Company," "we," or "us") collects, uses, and protects the personal information you provide while using the Photoshoot AI online service ("Service"). By accessing or using the Service, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as outlined in this Policy.

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information: When you sign up for the Service, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and optional demographic information, including gender, ethnicity, and age.

1.2 Uploaded Images: As part of the Service, you may upload images of your face. These images are processed to generate a custom model and are used solely for training purposes. We do not retain these images after the training process is completed.

1.3 Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use the Service, including your interactions with the website, preferences, and settings.

2. How We Use Your Information

2.1 Custom Model Generation: The personal information you provide, along with the uploaded images, is used to generate a custom model tailored to your individual characteristics.

2.2 Service Improvement: We may use the information collected to improve the Service, enhance user experience, and develop new features and functionalities.

2.3 Communication: We may use your email address to send you important notifications, updates, and promotional offers related to the Service. You can opt-out of promotional emails at any time.

3. Information Sharing

3.1 Third-Party Service Providers: We may engage third-party service providers to assist in operating and maintaining the Service. These providers have access to your personal information only to perform specific tasks on our behalf and are obligated to protect your information.

3.2 Legal Requirements: We may disclose your personal information if required to do so by law or in response to valid legal requests, such as court orders or government regulations.

4. Data Security

4.1 We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

5. Your Rights

5.1 Access and Modification: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information held by us. You can review and modify your account information through the Service.

5.2 Data Retention: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide the Service and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Policy. Once your data is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

6. Children's Privacy

6.1 The Service is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If we become aware that personal information of a minor has been inadvertently collected, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.

7. Changes to this Policy

7.1 We reserve the right to modify or update this Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the revised Policy on the Service. Your continued use of the Service after the changes will signify your acceptance of the updated Policy.

8. Contact Us

8.1 If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact us at support@photoshootai.app.
data-deletion:
If you would like to request the deletion of your personal data held by Photoshoot AI, please follow the instructions below.

1. Data Subject Rights

1.1 Under applicable data protection laws, you have the right to request the deletion of your personal data.

1.2 Please note that certain data, such as the images you uploaded for model training, are automatically deleted from our servers after the training process is completed. However, other data associated with your account may be retained unless you request its deletion.

2. Submitting a Data Deletion Request

2.1 To request the deletion of your personal data, please send an email to support@photoshootai.app with the subject line "Data Deletion Request."

2.2 In your email, please provide the following information to help us locate and process your request:

  • The email address associated with your Photoshoot AI account

2.3 We may need to verify your identity to ensure the security and privacy of your personal data. Additional information or identification may be requested to complete the deletion process.

3. Processing of Data Deletion Requests

3.1 Upon receipt of your data deletion request, we will review and process it in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

3.2 We will make reasonable efforts to respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and comply with the applicable legal requirements.

3.3 Please note that there may be circumstances where we are unable to fulfill your deletion request, such as if retention of certain data is necessary for legal or legitimate business purposes.

4. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns regarding the deletion of your personal data or if you require further assistance, please contact our support team at support@photoshootai.app.
